author: jleroux
msg: A patch from Pierre Smits for "Move CuttingListReport.groovy to appropriate folder" https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/OFBIZ-6069
Currently the file is in the widget folder. This should be in the appropriate actions folder under webapp.

author: kkolinko
msg: Mention the unit size for upgradeAsyncWriteBufferSize, as was asked via comments.a.o
This setting does not exist in Tomcat 9 (removed in r1650512).
